However, Azhi is vengeful, and as Ashima and Ahei are in a valley, he opens a floodgate, sending a river into the valley. Ashima is drowned. Grieving, Ahei calls out her name. Ashima replies, having been turned into a stone pillar (part of the famous Stone Forest in China's province of Yunnan), telling the Sani people that whenever they call out her name, she will reply to them.—deschreiber

Title: Måske i morgen
Synopsis: Students Erik and Niels become involved in a serious traffic accident that comes to change their lives and put their friendship to the test.

Title: X-paroni
Synopsis: Baron Wilhelm von Tandem, CEO of the Tandem Corporation, gets mixed up with a spitting image of himself, an innocent country boy Kalle. Both characters conveniently amnesiac, they start living each other's lives and dating each other's girlfriends, succeeding in their new roles better than in their original ones. Level-headed Kalle soon spots the bad guys who are after the Baron's money, and the Baron brings innovative ideas to the countryside.—Markku Kuoppamäki

Title: Man of the Cursed Valley
Synopsis: Gwen, who is married to Torito, an Indian, escapes from a rape attempt and is found wandering in the wilderness by Johnny, who leaves her with the missionary, Father Ryan. Warring families and those, who had assaulted her, are still on their trail.

Title: Cordillera
Synopsis: DESTROY THIS MAN and a fortune in diamonds is yours.

Title: Echo
Synopsis: The respected lawyer discovers that his name is on the list of Gestapo informers.

Title: The Face of Death
Synopsis: Felipe arrives at the ranch of his uncle, who is accused of having stolen the virgin's crown from the church. So he and his faithful squire set out to find the real thieves.

Title: Fuera de la ley
Synopsis: Tom Carter sends his son Billy to get the sheriff's help when the farm is being attacked by neighbor Jon Pryce's henchmen. Billy returns, finds his father murdered and sets out to find the killers Pryce hired, Black Jack and his gang.

Title: The Convicts Without Fetters
Synopsis: Yilmaz is released from prison, while trying to talk to the girl he loves, on the other hand, he embarks on a tough struggle against the order established by a landowner.

Title: Sluzbeni polozaj
Synopsis: The managers of a textile enterprise use various scams to obtain all kinds of personal benefits, until the machinations exposed. Through the work of few combine workers, who are using demagoguery forms in running the company, in order to gain personal profit, reasons are discovered which lead to illegal actions, frauds and personal dramas. The frame for the plot is a polemic dialogue in one of the editorial offices...

Title: The Magical Cloak
Synopsis: In second half of XX century a couple of student who had been called " pioneer" in Azerbaijan USSR try to make a opening after repairing in Shah Palace. Indian wizard shows up and gives a rope to pioneers as a gift for reopenning of palace. Processes starts after that.

Title: Shape of the Night
Synopsis: A woman is pushed into prostitution by her violent yakuza boyfriend.

Title: Gamos Ala... Ellinika
Synopsis: At a whimsical masquerade, an art student meets the man of her dreams; however, after an enchanting night, they will find out that the road to a successful married life is not always easy. Can they manage to make it work? At a reckless but whimsical masquerade, the young art student, Mina--whose mother is bent on giving her away in marriage to an affluent gentleman--finally meets Petros, the man of her dreams. However, after an enchanting night between a glorious Roman centurion and a sweet-faced Catholic nun, the enamoured couple will soon find out that the road to matrimony--and, then, to a successful married life--is not always easy. Will Mina and Petros manage to make it work?—Nick Riganas

Title: Cumbite
Synopsis: A man returns to Haiti after spending fifteen years in Cuba. He wants to reach the cooperation and the community in the fight against poverty and wants to defeat a drought by constructing a canal from the mountains.

Title: Who Was Maddox?
Synopsis: A publisher is nearly framed for murder, but he appears to have been goaded by the blackmailer who has also blackmailed the publisher's wife.

Title: Ôkami to buta to ningen
Synopsis: A lonely gangster tries recruiting men to plunder a respected and powerful gang. Sabu and his pals hold a pauper's funeral for Sabu's mother. His brother Jiro arrives home, fresh out of jail, and Sabu pointedly states that Jiro is not invited. Jiro meanwhile is planning a big job - steal 40 million in cash and drugs, and he invites Sabu and gang to act as decoys, for 50,000 each. The sting is a success, but the double-crossing starts almost immediately. Sabu discovers how little of the take they were promised and hides the stash. Jiro and his slimy partner pressure the kids to fess up. Meanwhile, their respectable elder brother Ichiro is being leaned on by the town's big boss, whose money it was.—sharptongue

Title: Revolt of the Barbarians
Synopsis: A roman consul is sent to Gaul to investigate the theft of gold shipments. He discovers that the gold is being stolen by a tribe of barbarians--whose leader is the governor of Gaul.

Title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
Synopsis: A woman in an arranged marriage falls in love with her husband's brother.

Title: Aa bakudan
Synopsis: Filmed as a traditional Japanese play, a yakuza boss is released from prison, but finds his gang usurped by a shady politician. With the help of his former cell mate he decides to assassinate the politician with an explosive pen.

Title: Whirlpool of Women
Synopsis: Living in Manchuria on the eve of the Second World War, Nunami and Sugaku accept an arranged marriage despite their different expectations and aspirations. Nunami misses intellectual conversations and Sugaku feels more at home in her bar. When Nunami tells her that he observed her with her lover they decide to move to Tokyo to make a new start. There Nunami meets Shimura, an office colleague with whom he enjoys the long desired conversations. Sugaku takes a decision with grave consequences. WHIRLPOOL OF FLESH is one of four experimental and existentialist black-and-white films NAKAHIRA made in 1964.

Title: Le grain de sable
Synopsis: Business tycoon dies in plane crash. Suspected, Georg, his main partner, Alain, a young Turkish finance, and Anna Maria, the group's proxy, are all seeking his succession. Magnate of a powerful trust, Coppolos has just been sent "ad patres" by the explosion of his private plane. A young civil servant, full of future, at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Laurent, reveals to the commissioner in charge of the investigation that this murder meets conflicting interests, related to the east and to the west, as it should be. The west is called Alain Compton, the east is Georges Richter. There remains Anna Maria, former mistress of Coppolos, former wife of Richter, who probably would like to share in the cake and, meanwhile, lets himself be wooed by Alain.

Title: Los Palomos
Synopsis: Emilio and Virtudes Palomo are invited by don Alberto, the boss of Emilio, to a dinner at his chalet. Don Alberto, which confuses simplicity with stupidity, intends to submit the Palomo's as a suspicious of a crime he has committed.

Title: Vengeance
Synopsis: A Confederate captain's younger brother is flogged to death in a Union stockade. The captain vows revenge. Two years later he finds the men responsible running a rustling operation in a small western town.

Title: Le gros coup
Synopsis: Frank Willes, a young soccer player gets into an accident.He has shocked the car of a rich businessman who died in the accident.Then Frank discovers that the the widow of the businessman, Clémece Grandval will become rich because of the life insurance and that maybe this accident was fraudulent.—zutterjp48

Title: Un mostro e mezzo
Synopsis: A thief steals a suitcase but it contains a corpse and the thief is sentenced, but is released by the robbed doctor, who then subjects him to a facial plastic that makes him equal to a criminal.

Title: Dead Woman from Beverly Hills
Synopsis: After finding the naked body of Lu in the woods of Beverly Hills, CG investigates the paramours she described in her diary, suspecting one was the murderer.

Title: Charlie Weaver and the John Deere Show
Synopsis: Charlie Weaver tries to avoid the advances of a woman while trying to attend a John Deere show.

Title: Red Scarf
Synopsis: During the Korean War, pilots of the 10th Fighter Wing of the South Korean Air Force fly their majestic Saber jets in daily dangerous missions against Communist North Korean targets. Despite suffering great losses, the air force commanders want to continue their daily bombing runs to Pyeongyang from Gangneung during the Korean War. Captain Na Kwan-jung starts to notice that a new 'enjoy the moment' mentality has taken hold of the pilots who daily face death.—Anonymous

Title: Karuppu Panam
Synopsis: The city witnesses series of abductions, burglary, extortion-all involving rich people. Police investigations lead to the ring leader of a gang and the discovery is shocking.

Title: Le sette vipere (Il marito latino)
Synopsis: A woman has her husband's estate posessed, him thrown out of their house and gets custody of their two children. The man flees to Italy with the children and fights for his rights before a tribunal.

Title: I Kypros stis floges
Synopsis: The conflicts between the Cypriot fighters and the English conquerors and the story of a family that give everything to the struggle for freedom.

Title: Búsqueme a esa chica
Synopsis: Palma de Mallorca is the stage where Marisol and her father make their living by singing and dancing for the tourists who come to the island. Suddenly an attractive, elegant, wealthy American named John Morrison comes into Marisol's life.

Title: Wenn man baden geht auf Teneriffa
Nemuri Kyôshirô: Engetsugiri
Synopsis: The shogun's illegitimate son decapitates a peasant which draws in nomadic Nemuri Kyoshiro into more sword-fighting adventures when he's blamed for the beheading.

Title: Face of a Stranger
Synopsis: In prison, two inmates are getting out soon. One, soon getting out, has been sent up for a heist of several thousand pounds, still not recovered. The other, getting out before him, pumps the other for details of his home life, so he he can assume the other's identity and get to the loot first.

Title: Når enden er go'
Synopsis: The journalist Claudius and the rich man's daughter Dorte fall in love, but Dorte's father, who is a diaper manufacturer, does not have much of a scam for the unemployed Claudius. To be able to marry, the young couple must therefore prove that they can earn a living themselves. And what they lack in business sense, they compensate for with creative inventions.—Danskfilmskat

Title: Seventy Deadly Pills
Synopsis: A gang of children, "The Rockets" have their clubhouse (above an old garage) used by a pair of villains on the run. The villains have stolen a doctors car which had some deadly pills left in it. One of the children finds the pills and, thinking they are sweets, shares them out to the rest of the gang. The race is on for the police to find them all before the children eat any of the deadly pills.—Steve Crook <steve@brainstorm.co.uk>

Title: Tiger of Terror
Synopsis: When Sandokan learns he is the rightful heir to the throne of Malaysia, he immediately sets of to claim his land back.

Title: La nueva Cenicienta
Synopsis: Antonio, the famous dancer, is preparing a big television performance, but he needs a good female dancer. One day he sees a girl dancing in the street, but she runs away when he tries to talk to her--and one of her shoes falls off. This will be Antonio's only hint as he searches for her. She is the new Cinderella.—Miguel A. Andrade <andrade@gredos.cnb.uam.es>

Title: Panienka z okienka
Synopsis: Krystyna and Marysia are kidnapped by the Tatars. Two young men set out to find and bring back the girls.

Title: The Rash One
Synopsis: Paco's father, before he died, placed the boy in a hotel as a bellhop. But with 18 years, Paco becomes unemployed. Paco looks then for another job, but for a young unprepared as himself is not easy at all and as a consequence he will go from failure to failure until he decides to take a shortcut to obtain fame and money: to be a matador.—jsanchez

Title: Cha Cha Cha
Synopsis: A woman first insults a blind singer, then gets him cured, falls in love with him but ends up rejecting him. After her return from abroad, Lali adjusts to life in India along with her devout Hindu mother, Laxmi; an easy-going father, Dinanath; two sisters, Kalpana and Geeta, and spends most of her time dancing along with her sisters and friends. On her way to the Mandir, she assumes a singer, Puranchan, is teasing her and she slaps him, but ends up apologizing when she is told that he is blind. Guilt-ridden, she makes arrangements for him to be taken to Bombay, has his vision restored, and both fall in love with each other. Dinanath takes a liking to Puranchan and not only gets him a job but also wants him to wed Lali. About to inform his parents, Purchan does not know that Dinanath has actually instructed Lali not to see him anymore as he is a Harijan (Lower-Caste).—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com) Dinanath is a the head if a westernize family and has educated his daughter's abroad and makes them socialize with young men at home and even joins them.When his wife Laxmi brings a blind man Puranchand Kashmiri hone .He graciously takes care of his testament .Puranchand falls in live with one of his daughter's Lali.Dinanath approves it but when he comes to know hat Puran is from lower cast he disapproves their relationship.Puran is a great dancer and takes upper class grade with his skills.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Fem mand og Rosa
Synopsis: Burglar Herluf "Smukke Arne" Jensen is in hospital, in a room with a district judge, a bank clerk, and a Legation secretary; this last is being blackmailed by an extortionist who keeps the evidence against him in a bank vault. Arne will rob the bank to help his new friend.

Title: Swedish Portraits
Synopsis: An unemployed man looks down from his window at a female street musician singing in front of a symphony orchestra in his courtyard. He immediately falls in love with the songstress, and runs after her along the streets of Stockholm. They pass a lonesome woman, who at once falls in love with the unemployed man, and starts chasing him. The trio continues to chase each other, split, and start chasing again, while they pass through a series of absurd situations among eccentric persons. Unable to get the man she loves, the lonesome woman goes to a restaurant, and starts drinking. Next morning she finds a stranger in her bed. He presents himself as Björkman. Both try to get away from the embarrassing situation as quickly as possible. Meanwhile the unemployed man tries in vain to win the songstress. The chase continues. Suddenly the lonesome woman realizes that she loves Björkman. She tells him that they must get married, because she is pregnant. At the wedding party Björkman falls in love with another woman, and when she leaves, he starts chasing her. He is followed by the lonesome woman, the songstress, and several others, all of them chasing one another in a long string.—Maths Jesperson {maths.jesperson1@comhem.se}

Title: No Man's Land
Synopsis: An American Corporal stationed in a sparsely occupied Korean province unexpectedly finds true love amidst the horrors of war.

Title: Qawwali Ki Raat
Synopsis: A drama movie based on the Indian subcontinent art from Qawwali.

Title: Circe
Synopsis: Delia Mañara is notorious in her quarter of Buenos Aires for the mysterious deaths of two of her fiancés. She lives in a twilight world and gains most satisfaction through the exercise of power over others. About perverse sexual gratification in a repressed Catholic environment. Delia Mañara is notorious in her quarter of Buenos Aires for the mysterious deaths of two of her fiancés. She lives in a twilight world and gains most satisfaction through the exercise of power over others. It emerges that she killed the two men by poisoning them with the sweets she makes; when this fails with her third fiancé, he is freed from her fatal attraction by the knowledge.—Ulf Kjell Gür

Title: Samson
Synopsis: Dara Singh plays the mythological Samson character to the hilt as he must contend with a love starved princess and her all female warriors, a sorcerer and his magical dwarfs, a dinosaur sized lizard, and a rebel in love with a hand-maiden.

Title: La patru pasi de infinit
Synopsis: A young officer of the Romanian Army performs a sabotage mission against the Nazi regime. Seriously wounded, the officer can not reach the fixed place and finds shelter in a surgeon's home.

Title: The Erotic Mr. Rose
Synopsis: An omniscient narrator introduces us to Mr. Rose, chasing butterflies in San Francisco's Union Square. Rose is not content to collect bugs; he's also a prude and a scold, staging a one-man campaign against the city's adult entertainments. He defaces photographs, complains by phone and letter to city hall, disrupts live performances and fowls film in projection booths. Then, at a nightclub featuring belly dancers, Rose is dispirited by the lascivious behavior of young people in attendance. While Rose is disheartened and vulnerable, Satan pays him a visit and tempts him into a life of dissolution. Will Rose remain pure or will he succumb and become the erotic Mr. Rose?—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: Il vuoto
Synopsis: The romance between a nuclear physicist and a translator from the United Nations Organization.

Title: Upal
Synopsis: When the city streets turn empty during the summer heat wave, two elderly gentlemen try to make it lively again.

Title: The Dress
Synopsis: Edit is pleased that her mother agrees to let her buy a dress she loves, but which in fact is made for an adult woman.

Title: Donde tú estés
Synopsis: On the Costa del Sol, Lisa, daughter of a wealthy industrialist, and Paul Vallier, a French writer, meet casually.

Title: Tine
Synopsis: Based on the novel by Herman Bang, about Tine experiencing the outbreak of the war in 1864, where she is to housekeep and take care of a mansion in wear time, while having a love affair with the master, while his wife is away.

Title: Mr. Twentieth Century
Synopsis: Dash Habib who lives with his sick mother alone is a thief who helps the poor all the time. One night he saves a rich girl Setareh from some scoundrels. But this is only the beginning of the troubles and romance for Habib.

Title: Ek Don Teen
Synopsis: Ashok and Srinivas are two youngsters in he CID department when their senior officer is killed Ashok takes the responsibility of finding him.Ashok and Srinivas meet Ameet and Suman and fall in love where he finds a person following them whose well known smuggler known as Malak to whom all the secret information is leaked from CID office by Rosie.Ashok manages to get hold of Malak but he escapes and later kidnaps Ameeta but gets shot dead by an unknown person outside palatial house.Ashok ,Srinivas,Suman along with Ameeta reach the spot where Malak was shot .But his body goes missing and they enter the palatial house to find the truth which has strange people where things seem not to be normal and has people operating according to orders of a unknown person.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Destination Death
Synopsis: A German man's choir of 8 persons is on a vacation in Yugoslavia. Most are middle-aged previous Nazis. They arrive at a village populated solely by women who avoid contact. 20 years earlier the Germans murdered all males. The choir tries to cheer up the mood by a German song, but then avoidance is replaced by hostility. When asking to buy bread they are referred to a woman who gives them a box with 437 empty cartridges, the remnants of the murders. By "Yugoslavian for tourists" a young boy makes contact with a woman who became mentally ill then. She misunderstands his words so that she will get her son back if she will bake bread. Meanwhile the men steal and slaughter a pig. Then the women throw their car down a mountain-side. On the next day the choir and the women reconcile. A priest from a nearby village finds a car they may borrow for one day. Since their own car is insured they do not report the women. When they leave, the mentally ill woman runs after to give them the bread she has baked.—Max Scharnberg, Stockholm, Sweden

Title: Alle tiders kupp
Synopsis: Three men have been working without paying taxes, and now have to pay their governmental taxes. They are so desperate that they decide to rob a liqueur store. Stealing 50.000 bottles of liqueur might be easy, but how to get rid of them? Filmen handler om tre menn som røver et vinmonopol. De er alle skjønnslignet og forfulgt av myndighetene - mer eller mindre berettiget - og finner en original måte å få penger til å betale skatten. Men en ting er å røve 50.000 brennevinsflasker, noe ganske annet er det å bli kvitt dem igjen.—Anonymous

Title: Les gros bras
Synopsis: Nicole, on the plane, returns to Paris. During the trip, a thief slips a stolen diamond bracelet into his bag. Getting off the plane in Orly, a passenger is relieved of a superb diamond bracelet that the thief, to go through customs, slips into the bag of a young girl, Nicole. When Jean, her brother, and Philippe, her fiancé, find the jewel that has fallen out of his bag, they urgently leave the studio of Ludovic, a wacky boss for whom they make photo novels, to go in pursuit of their sister and fiancée, herself pursued by the gallant thief who would like to recover the precious deposit. The newspapers announce the theft of the jewel and the young people understand that its presence in Nicole's hands is fortuitous. They therefore rush to the "Prince of Wales" hotel where the unfortunate owner, Mrs. Andromes, has stayed to return her property. This one is delighted but her husband, an explosive Brazilian, is less so because he fears the expertise of the insurance company: the bracelet is fake, the original having been offered by him to a young dancer staying at the same hotel. , whose favors he seeks. We must therefore make the substitution without delay: it is our two photographers who will use all the resources of their fertile imagination to delay the expertise and find the trace of the real bracelet because the young dancer, impecunious, got rid of it and l 'replaced with a copy. From corridors to stairs, they go up the line, helped by Nicole, harassed by the hot Mr. Andromes, suspected by the police. As they reach their goal, the bracelet, the real one this time, is again stolen before their eyes by the same thief. But this one was recognized by the young girl: disheveled pursuit through the hotel which ends with a passage in tornado in the kitchens where soon flutter the cream pies. The thief, out of breath, abandons the jewel in a champagne bucket: all's well that ends well. But it's not over yet: our stubborn thief, decked out with a beard, succeeds in getting hired by the trepidant Ludovic, which allows him to once again steal the famous bracelet from Mrs. Andromes who had agreed to appear in the photo novel inspired by his mishap.

Title: The Hope
Synopsis: A group of outcasts, including a vagabond and a prostitute, gather at the outskirts of the industrial area of a large Czech city, one of the things that helps some of them survive is alcohol.

Title: Poompuhar
Synopsis: After losing his entire wealth to a courtesan, Kovalan returns to his wife, Kannagi. She offers him her last piece of jewelry to help him but he is falsely accused of theft and beheaded by the king.

Title: Trouble Among Widows
Synopsis: A widow is looking for the drug that her deceased husband was hiding. While a policeman leads the investigation, other people try to find the famous product. Guillaume Valmont has just died accidentally on the road. He leaves to his young widow, Isabelle, a prosperous herbalist's shop. On the day of the funeral, a beautiful, mourning stranger throws herself on the grave of the deceased, to the great astonishment of the audience. To avoid a scandal, the young widow takes the newcomer, Judith, to a café. She learns, with amazement, that her husband had a double life. When she returns, she finds the door of the herbalist's shop broken down and the apartment broken into. Nothing, however, seems to have disappeared. A young police inspector, Laforêt, who is sensitive to Isabelle's charm, leads the investigation.

Title: Mit csinált Felséged 3-tól 5-ig?
Synopsis: King Matthias gets tired of the usual domestic tiffs, so he leaves the capital and travels through the country in disguise. His jealous wife also puts on a disguise and follows her husband to find out what he is doing.

Title: Les durs à cuire ou Comment supprimer son prochain sans perdre l'appétit
Synopsis: A playwright has to murder if he does not want to be murdered . A playwright attends his last effort's premiere ,then returns to his desirable mansion to enjoy a well-deserved rest;alas ,no sooner had he reached the door than the chimney fell on him. The writer discovers that his wife has an affair with his collaborator,and ,it makes the matters worse,the lovers want to do away with him ;he decides to launch a preventive strike and to achieve the perfect crime to eliminate his rival :drowning the victim in his bath ,then throwing him into the lake.—dbdumonteil

Title: Five Sweet Girls
Synopsis: Two lovers who want to be famous.

Title: Mga bata ng lagim
Synopsis: The "Young Ones" in their first horror-comedy riot.

Title: Sedotti e bidonati
Synopsis: Two rich Sicilian cousins sell their farm because they want to help two fake Siamese twins separate and then marry them. After the operation the girls are thought to be dead but then they reappear to con more money out of the two gullible men. Will they manage to do so?—Salvatore Santangelo <pappagone2@libero.it>

Title: Zelyonyy ogonyok
Synopsis: A film comedy about the everyday life of a never-dull young taxi driver, Sergei Nikitin, who, having gone to work in a taxi fleet, receives a "Moskvich" written off due to its unsuitability as a "test" and goes on his first trip around his favorite city; about his readiness to always come to the aid of people.

Title: Death Comes at High Noon
Synopsis: Entering a house to borrow the phone, a crime writer finds a murdered man and is knocked out. The police calls it suicide. A boy helps him investigate.

Title: The Whistlers
Synopsis: Young, broke acting students look for work and love in sixties Paris.

Title: Frühstück mit dem Tod
Synopsis: A district attorney is accused of wrongfully convicting an innocent man by the man's widow and is subsequently framed for her murder by the real culprits.

Title: Geron Busabos: Ang batang Quiapo
Synopsis: Deep in the heart of Manila, a young man lives loves and fights for survival he is Geron Busabos, ang Batang Quiapo.

Title: Ragam P. Ramlee
Synopsis: The film is divided into three segments Ramlee And Saloma ,Ask for Tail Numbers and Damascus.

Title: A Week in Paradise
Synopsis: As free as a bird, a penniless vagabond with a heart of gold sees his quiet life turn upside down when a desperate runaway bride seeks refuge in his humble home, intent on escaping a loveless marriage. Can they outwit the betrayed groom? As free as a bird, Aristos, a penniless vagabond with a heart of gold, leads a simple life on the outskirts of society. However, his quiet life will turn upside down when the desperate runaway bride, Lena, seeks refuge in his humble home, intent on escaping a loveless marriage. As a result, Aristos, sympathetic to the hopeless woman's embarrassing predicament, will do everything in his power to reunite her with her true love, the young dreamer, Yorgos. Now, the three of them must work together to make it work. But, can they outsmart the betrayed groom who refuses to take this delicate situation lying down?—Nick Riganas

Title: The Inheritance
Synopsis: When a relative leaves a large sum of money to a couple under the condition that they have a child, they become desperate to conceive.

Title: Gold, Glory and Custer
Synopsis: Several episodes of the TV series "Cheyenne" strung together and released as a feature.

Title: Lebanon at Night
Synopsis: He decides to kill himself, a young man leaves a letter for his sweetheart. The storyline intersects with a broader story that presents a panorama of life in the Lebanese capital of Beirut, moving between various nightclubs and revealing scenes of art and performance throughout the city.

Title: Stop-over Forever
Synopsis: The flight attendant Sue Chambers becomes frightened for her life when she discovers that one of her coworkers was killed because the murderer thought he was killing her. Her fear does not prevent Sue from looking into the matter and trying to learn the killer's identity.—Robert

Title: Hamburg: City of Vice
Synopsis: A couple of days in the life of a police station in Hamburg. The action is set in and around a police station in St Pauli, the docks area of Hamburg where prostitution and crimes of violence are rife. Glantz is the head of the uniformed officers, and does his best to keep order. Bruno Kapp has just got out of jail, and it looks as if he is going to seek revenge on Glantz for sending him down in the first place. Glantz doesn't take this seriously, and then suddenly he is alone on the roof with Kapp, and Kapp has got a gun ...—Hazel Freeman <hazel@tguk.net>

Title: The Crafty One
Synopsis: This lavish period action-adventure is an Egyptian version of The Count Of Monte Cristo.

Title: The 13 Most Beautiful Women
Synopsis: An experimental fiction/documentary film conceived and directed by 3 friends. Companion to Warhol's The Thirteen Most Beautiful Boys, and like that film the series includes far more Screen Test films than the title calls for. The film series was shown in several different versions during the years 1964 to 1970 - female beauty being more acceptable than male beauty.—Mahou 5 star

Title: Karanlikta Uyananlar
Synopsis: Story of a union strike at a paint factory.

Title: Intrigue in Los Angeles
Synopsis: F.B.I. agents David Blair and Thelma Avery are assigned to search for Professor Weiss, who had mysteriously disappeared after discovering an antidote for atomic radiation.

Title: The Scarlet Camellia
Synopsis: A young woman begins murdering all those responsible for her ailing father's condition. Because the girl is so outwardly sweet and innocent, the detective looking into the deaths does not suspect her.

Title: Villa Vennely, Home of Copenhagen Call Girls
Synopsis: A somewhat romanticized fairy-tale about an erotic guesthouse. Everything is improvised with amateur actors and without a script. The movie decades later has received a cult status as an obscure document of its day.

Title: Eight in the Footstep of One
Synopsis: A charming film about a group of children on a kibbutz in Israel who foil a plot by spies to blow up a Mirage jet during a military parade.

Title: Last Plane to Baalbeck
Synopsis: An Interpol agent is tasked with investigating the deaths of several other agents.

Title: The Three Sisters
Synopsis: In a small Russian town at the turn of the century, three sisters (Olga, Irina, and Masha) and their brother Andrei live but dream daily of their return to their former home in Moscow, where life is charming and stimulating meaningful. But for now they exist in a malaise of dissatisfaction. Soldiers from the local military post provide them some companionship and society, but nothing can suffice to replace Moscow in their hopes. Andrei marries a provincial girl, Natasha, and begins to settle into a life of much less meaning than he had hoped. Natasha begins to run the family her way. Masha, though married, yearns for the sophisticated life and begins a dalliance with Vershinin, an army officer with a sick and suicidal wife. Even Irina, the freshest, most optimistic of the sisters, begins to waver in her dreams until, finally, tragedy strikes.—Jim Beaver <jumblejim@prodigy.net>

Title: Phoolon Ki Sej
Synopsis: During a trip, a man falls in love with a woman, but they soon lose contact with each other. They meet many years later and get married. But she is hiding a secret, which she does not wish to reveal. Nirmal Verma and Karuna are attracted to each other, while the former is touring that part of the country. They get very intimate, he promises to return, and even leaves his address with her but she misplaces it. Both do meet after 5 years, and after formal introductions - get married; and she re-locates to live with him and his doctor brother, and Bhabhi, Janki. Shortly thereafter Nirmal and the rest of the family are baffled when they find out Karuna secretly leaves the house and goes to an unknown location - when confronted - she refuses to divulge anything.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Nihon kyôkaku-den
Synopsis: A timber merchant and haulage firm in late 19th century Tokyo is in trouble. The widowed lady owner is being threatened by a scheming competitor who is offering much cheaper labour. X has just left the army, and his buddies in the firm beg him to rejoin them as second in command, which he does. Thus emboldened, the firm tries to make a deal to stay in business, which launches a serious turf war.—sharptongue

Title: Obzalovaný
Synopsis: Managers at the construction of a big hydro plant are accused of having embezzled money. They have paid the workers generously in return for some of the money.

Title: El salario del crimen
Synopsis: Mario is a very strict policeman but when in the course of his partner's murder investigation meets Elsa, an attractive woman accustomed to luxury, he will not hesitate to cross the limits of the law to continue with her.

Title: Antar's Daughter
Synopsis: After the death of Antar, the men of Bani Fazaza tribe take revenge of the men of the tribe of Bani Abs; Antar's tribe, and kill all of them. Antar's sister manages to flee with Antar's daughter and hides her. She raised her to become a warrior and take revenge from her father's enemies when she grows up.—Mitwaly Osman

Title: Babruvahana
Synopsis: A film that portrays the life and valour of Babhruvahana, a character in the Hindu epic, Mahabharata. He is one of the sons of Arjuna, begotten through Chitrangada, the princess of Manipura.

Title: I hartopaihtra
Synopsis: About Aleka who is obsessed with playing cards and the efforts of her husband to make her quit this bad "habit". Passionate and utterly incorrigible, Aleka Oikonomidou, a compulsive gambler, lives only for the thrill of the game. Neck-deep in debt, Aleka neglects her two grown-up children, Nina and Lakis, and her husband, Andreas--who is at the end of his tether--just to play cards; however, desperate times call for desperate measures. They say, a leopard never changes its spots; nevertheless, can Andreas' daring plan bring Aleka back on track again?—Nick Riganas

Title: Pathlaag
Synopsis: "Balasaheb Panse is married to a lovely woman named Aasha. Aasha falls ill when Balasaheb is abroad, prompting him to return. But he returns only to see Aasha dying, resulting in him going in a state of depression. He even builds a statue in her memory. Some time later, a criminal named Nisha, who is the wife of dacoit Bandya Navale, gets arrested along with her gang. But to everybody's astonishment, she claims that she is the dead Aasha. But after some time a court room drama ensues. Balasaheb goes to see her and finds that Nisha indeed looks like Aasha, but he is unable to believe her. Nisha tells him all the things only Aasha could have known. Nisha's claims seem to be genuine, until Balasaheb asks her about a diary of Aasha, which is missing. Nisha is unable to find the diary, whose location was known only to her and Balasaheb. Fully convinced that Aasha is indeed dead and Nisha is an impostor, Balasaheb has her convicted. As a result of this trauma, she loses her mental balance and ends up in a mental asylum. What happens than and what will be Balasaheb's next step?"—Swapnil Pawar Balasaheb gets married to Asha and goes to London for further studies he returns back as he comes to know about Asha's illness and she dies in his arms,Balasaheb goes in depression and lives with her memories.One day inspector Salvi comes to meet Balasaheb and tells him about a bandit Nisha they caught on other day who claims to be his wife,Balasaheb meets her and is shocked that she totally resembles Asha. Balasaheb doesn't agree to this as Asha died in his arms,but the women tells such things about Balasaheb that only a wife would know .But it is impossible for Nisha to be alive as she was Cremenated in front of whole village by Balasaheb.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Tiempo de amor
Synopsis: Three independent stories that reflect some of the many faces of love. Elvira and Alfonso have been engaged for ten years in courtship, during which they have kept their chastity zealously, while waiting for him to pass public examinations. María (a department store employee) meets a handsome rich man with whom she decides to lose her virginity, but the true nature of the blue prince will soon be uncovered. Pilar and José, a young couple, struggle to keep alive the flame of their love despite the daily difficulties they encounter.—jsanchez

Title: Lampiao, King of the Badlands
Synopsis: The story of Virgulino, the famous Lampião, who led a bunch of cangaceiros (as his followers were called) through the Northeast of Brazil, and became respected by poor local people, for his sense of immediate justice.

Title: Thunder in Dixie
Synopsis: Mickey Arnold is a loving husband and a good friend to Ticker Welsh. However, when Mickey finds out that Ticker has seduced his wife, their friendship collapses. Now, the two are in a battle of wits, and Mickey can only win his wife back by getting first place in the annual Bible-Belt Race-a-Thon.—Lee Matthews

Title: Echigo Tsutsuishi Oyashirazu
Synopsis: Gonsuke has had to leave town to find employment and is working at a sake brewery far from his hometown. He travels back to his hometown to see and be with his mother when he hears that she has fallen ill. Despite the urgency he is sidetracked when he comes across a married woman called Oshin.—aghaemi

Title: Eagle Rock
Synopsis: A young lad attempts to climb Eagle Rock by himself and learns the hard way that sometimes teamwork is the best way to do things.

Title: El bracero del año
Synopsis: The movie theme is the migration of Mexicans to the United States in search of the "American dream". Piporro crosses the Rio Grande swimming illegally, and lives a series of events that lead him from walking away from the police to winning the award for "Bracero of the Year" for his work in the harvest. Prize that he will lose before returning to Mexico just as he had gone: no money in the bag.—Juve

Title: The Pearl Necklace
Synopsis: Salim is a simple farmer who loves Bedour and wants to marry her. He comes across a letter that he thinks is written to his lover, but it turns out that it's written by Bedour whom Ghawar loves and he returns from overseas with a pearl necklace for her.

Title: Le bluffeur
Synopsis: Fredo, a former gangster nicknamed "the Bluffer", wants to retrain after his release from prison, but his ex-accomplices want to find him.

Title: Jakoman to Tetsu
Synopsis: In a village subsisting on its herring fishery, a one-eyed criminal named Jakoman terrorizes the inhabitants. One of them, the son of the head of one of the fish companies by the name of Tetsu, decides to overthrow Jakoman and his cohorts.

Title: Young Sánchez
Synopsis: It is the portrait of the life of an amateur boxer who falls into the hands of a cruel manager while turning into professional.

Title: Our Blood Will Not Forgive
Synopsis: Two brothers seek revenge on the yakuza for the death of their father.

Title: Die Goldsucher von Arkansas
Synopsis: When gold is found near Marble City the rush brings farmer Brendel, Pastor Benson and gambler Ellis to town. Bandits and Cherokees threaten the settlers. Friends Phil and Pat try to restore order and find the culprit causing the mayhem. Based on the novel by Friedrich Gerstäcker, the film, set entirely in the state of Arkansas, tells of the conflict of interests between the local townspeople and homesteaders on the surrounding land, miners arriving during the gold rush, cowboys and cattle thieves who cause problems in the area, and the native tribes of the region. Two adventurers arrive in town and try to restore peace to it and its inhabitants.

Title: Los amores de Marieta - Los Fabulosos 20s
Bakumatsu zankoku monogatari
Synopsis: A headstrong young man seeks to join the Shinsengumi, but as his determination impresses his superiors, questions begin to arise as to his true identity and intentions.

Title: The Ninja Hunt
Synopsis: Four ex-samurai are hired to find and kill ninja infiltrators who are intent on destroying the Matsuyama clan.

Title: Heroes of the West
Synopsis: Two rascals who live by scamming are posing as heirs of a rich gold mine. Constantly fighting among themselves, they survive Indian attacks, hired gunmen, and even the very gallows.

Title: Un surîs în plina vara
Synopsis: Fanita, a young man eager to earn money as a result of personal initiatives, these companies will fail, leaving it eventually persuaded to join the CAP site of sat.Ecranizare novella "Forest" by Radu Dumitru Popescu. " Fanita hero happenings in the film is just today's Pacala or rather a Boborul. " - Dinu Sararu - 1965

Title: Naganiacz
Synopsis: 1945. Home Army soldier who hides in the village must decide if he wants to engage into dangerous situation to help group of Jewish runaways.

Title: Extraña ternura
Synopsis: The young and inexperienced godson of a millionaire falls in love with a married cafe singer. The millionaire opposes this relationship because he feels a "strange tenderness" for the boy.

Title: Buenos días, Acapulco
Synopsis: Viruta and Capulina arrive in Acapulco to work as bellhops in a luxurious hotel.

Title: Jetzt dreht die Welt sich nur um dich
Synopsis: Lilian Andreesen, the daughter of Danish newspaper king Holger, is crazy about music. Holger has just brought her back from the boarding school in Lausanne back to Denmark when Lilian surprised him with the news that she had received a commitment in the nightclub Tivoli. When Holger threatens to send her back to boarding school immediately, Lilian flees to Germany with her aunt Henriette's car. Not far from Heidelberg she has a breakdown and is towed by Martin Fischer at night. Although he is actually a law student, however, he earns his money for studying at Autozentrale Vogt as a car mechanic.Martin is initially critical of Lilian, his boss, the playboy Stefan Vogt, but takes a liking to the young woman. He places her in an inn in a room that was originally intended for his American love, Baby Bird, but which does not appear until the following day. Stefan now moves Lilian, as Baby Bird insists on full attention. Martin jumps in and spends a day with Lilian in Heidelberg. They look at all sights and go in the evening in a club where they sing a title together. Baby Bird and Stefan join in as well and Baby Bird forces Martin to dance with her. Disappointed, Lilian leaves the club. Stefan senses his chance with Lilian and invites her to a big party, where about 20 people are expected. In fact, he only invited LilianMartin learns that Lilian's car is being searched by the police because he actually belongs to her aunt Henriette. Henriette, on the other hand, is on her way to Heidelberg, as her car was spotted there. On the way she takes with her the charming Richard Fischer, who turns out to be the father of Martin. Henriette and Richard find the car in Stefan's car center and learn that Lilian is currently with Stefan. Meanwhile, she tries to fend off Stefan's advances. Timely, Martin appears to warn Lilian before the police, and Henriette comes to make Stefan and makes it clear that Lilian is not a thief, but the daughter of a heavy man. Martin, on the other hand, realizes that as a daughter of a good family, she can not be a match for him. To make matters worse, Martin is also dismissed by Stefan.Martin meets with his father, who falls in love with Henriette. Lilian wants to become down-to-earth and enroll in law school in Heidelberg. Although Lilian is now his fellow student, he largely ignores her. With Henriette and Richard's help, Lilian manages to test him: she pretends to be consumed with grief, and Martin wants to help her immediately without taking advantage of the situation. Both reconcile. Stefan, however, has not given up yet. He wants to marry Lilian and sends a corresponding telegram to Holger. Lilian also writes to her father that she has become engaged. Holger now drives to Heidelberg. Here Martin can prevent Stefan from extorting a marriage promise from Lilian with a trick. Stefan in turn is visited by Holger and almost beaten, Holger does not want to lose his daughter to a well-known Playboy. Stefan has to make a marriage promise in his distress Baby Bird. Holger goes to Henriette and Lilian in the hotel. Here are the couples. Henriette and Richard open Holger, that they will marry. Holger's marriage candidate for Lilian, the reporter Peter, has already married in Japan and appears with his wife in the hotel - he is spontaneously dismissed by Holger without notice. Lilian and Martin are engaged, but Holger does not want to allow a marriage. Only when Peter immediately wants to write a sensational article about the unfulfillable love of Lilian and Martin and makes a corresponding photo of the couple, Holger gives in: Both may marry and the photo will appear - in his newspaper, as an engagement picture. Stefan has to make a marriage promise in his distress Baby Bird. Holger goes to Henriette and Lilian in the hotel. Here are the couples. Henriette and Richard open Holger, that they will marry. Only when Peter immediately wants to write a sensational article about the unfulfillable love of Lilian and Martin and makes a corresponding photo of the couple, Holger gives in: Both may marry and the photo will appear - in his newspaper, as an engagement picture. but Holger does not want to allow a marriage. Only when Peter immediately wants to write a sensational article about the unfulfillable love of Lilian and Martin and makes a corresponding photo of the couple, Holger gives in: Both may marry and the photo will appear - in his newspaper, as an engagement picture. but Holger does not want to allow a marriage. Only when Peter immediately wants to write a sensational article about the unfulfillable love of Lilian and Martin and makes a corresponding photo of the couple, Holger gives in: Both may marry and the photo will appear - in his newspaper, as an engagement picture.

Title: Unsere tollen Tanten in der Südsee
Neutron vs. the Maniac
Synopsis: Neutron, a wrestler/superhero, investigates a series of murders at a sanitarium.

Title: Relaxe-toi chérie
Synopsis: Hélène and François have been a perfect couple for twelve years. Hélène discovers psychoanalysis with Doctor Kougloff. She is convinced that her husband's apparent balance hides horrible tragedies. Hélène and François have been a happy couple for twelve years. The ace. Madame discovers the beauties of psychoanalysis in the guise of the attractive lecturer David Kouglow. Soon convinced that the good health and fidelity of her husband hide horrible tragedies, she decides three of her friends to help her so that her husband cheats on her so that she can assume his ulterior desires. But François discovers the truth. He decides to organize a somewhat special evening where, after the marital reconciliation, the doctor will observe in them another complex: that of Philemon and Baucis, which still suggests some small family dramas in perspective.

Title: Kardong kidlat
Synopsis: Jess Lapid riding fighting shooting and loving his way to newer and greater heights of entertainment.

Title: Toka jonë
Synopsis: Events take place in a village of Northern Albania during the first years following Liberation. After many years Loke returns to her children with the hope of living together with them now. But her oldest son, Leka, being under the continuence of the kulak Tuç Marku, again drives her out of the house. Tuç has played a wicked role in the destruction of Gjoka s family. Murrash, who is the youngest brother, exposes Tuç and complete harmony is established in the family.The people s power is making the centuries old dream of the peasant a reality:the Agrarian Reform. To protect his properties, Tuç instingtes Vata, a man of a murky past, to assassinate Murrash. The crime arouses the indignation of the entire village. The villagers liquidate the bandits and capture Tuç Maku alive.—KLEVISI

Title: White Voices
Synopsis: In 18th century Rome, a young man in a choir of castrati falls for the beautiful wife of a powerful aristocrat.

Title: For Men Only
Synopsis: Two well-qualified women geologists, refused jobs in the Sinai because they are not men, cross-dress to get the positions. The two established male geologists there, unaware that their new colleagues are really female, try their best to seduce the "boys". True love (of course) reigns eventually when the truth is revealed.—laduqesa

Title: Agonies
Synopsis: It is the first feature film to be produced entirely in Esperanto. Using a scenario by director himself, the actors of the Internacia Arta Teatro (International Arts Theatre) presented a crime story, set in the Parisian periphery of petty thieves and cheats.

Title: Ein Frauenarzt klagt an
Synopsis: Hans Thomas is the popular chief doctor at a district hospital. After the death of his wife, he devoted himself exclusively to his profession. After careful consideration, he has sterilized women many times for medical or social reasons.

Title: Maibritt, das Mädchen von den Inseln
Onmitsu Kenshi
Synopsis: While helping a wounded agent of the Iga, Shintaro is attacked by Koga agents who think he received an item that they had already killed in an effort to obtain.

Title: Istanbul sokaklarinda
Synopsis: Metin, who ruined the coke factory owned by his father because of his fondness for women and gambling, working for his ex-lover Sevim's father as a driver. Will his father, who has fallen as a beggar, be able to forgive Metin?

Title: Attention! There Is a Magician in the Town!
Sholi gia soferines
Synopsis: Two best friends and owners of a small driving school in Athens who struggle to prepare their female students for the permit test will find love when they least expect it. This film follows the exploits of two friends who own a school that gives driving lessons. One of them is handsome and always gets to teach all the beautiful girls, while the other is left with the ungly, old students.—Chris Makrozahopoulos <makzax@hotmail.com> Two best friends--the handsome and frivolous Dinos, and the active horse-racing fan, Babis--own a small driving school in Athens. Unsurprisingly, the young charmer gets the lion's share of the school's young and fresh female clientele, whereas Babis gets to prepare the rest of the students; however, it will take a beautiful aspiring driver and her desperate last-minute plan to finally find love. Is this a match made in heaven?—Nick Riganas

Title: Sawaal Majha Aika
Synopsis: Two Tamasha troupe masters Jyotiba and Raghoo compete against each other in a musical question and answer where the looser has to wear a Lugada (Saree) all their life.Jyotiba looses the competition and has to wear the Saree all his life following which his wife passes away out of shock.Jyotiba to soon passes away and his daughter Anu swears that she will train into this competition and defeat Raghoo and make him wear a Saree.Years later Anu decides to enter the competition with her troupe and comes across Jaywanta a star of another troupe she hires him in the group due to his skills.But Anu finds that Jaywanta is son of Raghoo and decides to back out of competition but her aunt and uncle convinces her not to do so. Jaywanta's troupe members kidnap Anu in fear of loosing the competitions and blame Jaywanta for it but Raghoo reaches her home safely.Anu now challenges Raghoo that she will compete with Jaywanta in a upcoming big competition and complete revenge of her father by making Raghoo wear a Saree.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Lito vilovito
Synopsis: A summer in the life of tourist-seducing boys. There is a phenomenon on the Dalmatian coast which is called "the seagulls" boys who every summer try to "get laid" with as many pretty foreign tourists as they can. Another "lito vilovito" ("fairy summer") has come to a small Dalmatian town. Boys are taking it in different ways, each of them trying to have as many names of his "trophies" written on "his" stone pillar. One of them even has a steady local girlfriend whose name, as he says, "is not written on his pillar, but in his heart". There is, however, one of them who is an object of constant mocking, a shy romantic boy who flies in his own clouds and his pillar is still blank. This summer is going to be a little different for him, though.—Damir Dukic

Title: Gözleri ömre bedel
Synopsis: A brooding composer longs for his late wife, oblivious to the fact that mysteriously she is still alive since she has restarted her life as an alcoholic drifter. After a late night concert the two come across each other.

Title: Sotrudnik ChK
Synopsis: The action takes place in 1920 during the Civil War in Russia. The young Red Army soldier Alex sent to work in the Cheka. Alexey takes part in various operations, his girlfriend dies, exposing a gang of whites.

Title: Mord for åbent tæppe
Synopsis: It's premiere night at the theater, and the atmosphere is tense. The carpet goes up, but unfortunately for the theater director, someone has filled the play's revolver with real cartridges instead of loose gunpowder. Police are called and an investigation is underway: Who committed the murder for the open carpet?—Danskfilmskat

Title: Babaing kidlat
Synopsis: Never before has science-fiction struck the local screen with such hair-raising thrill and excitement and yet it has action, comedy, suspense, love and romance.

Title: La fleur de l'âge, ou Les adolescentes
Synopsis: Un film en quatre épisodes présentant des adolescentes choisies parmi les plus représentatives de leur pays et de notre temps, en Italie, en France, au Japon et au Canada. En dépit des particularités de style des cinéastes, on retrouve en chacun d'eux le même désir de ne rien affirmer, de ne pas juger, mais de montrer tout simplement. A film in four episodes presenting teenage girls chosen as representative of their country and our time, in Italy, France, Japan and Canada. In spite of the stylistic peculiarities of the filmmakers, we find in each of them the same desire not to affirm anything, not to judge, but to quite simply show.

Title: Einai megalos o kaimos
Synopsis: Behind her ailing father's back, a young woman who has a clandestine affair with a Wall-of-Death daredevil works as a singer to support them. What would happen if the parent knew her secret plans? Would he take it lying down? Behind her father's back--the virtuoso bouzouki player, Anastasis Vazeos--the beautiful, Lisa, has a clandestine affair with the kind-hearted Wall-of-Death daredevil, Michalis. However, when a serious illness incapacitates the weary musician, Lisa will have to search for a job to support her father, against his will. With Anastasis being gravely ill and Lisa working as a singer at a nightclub, this is, indeed, a volatile situation. What would happen if the parent knew his only daughter's secret plans? Would he take it lying down?—Nick Riganas

Title: Spotkanie ze szpiegiem
Synopsis: On the Koszalin coast, secret agent Bernard is about to land information on the deployment of Polish missile bases.

Title: Shuang feng ji yuan
Synopsis: The husband-and-wife team of Ivy Ling Po and Chin Han returned to another Huangmei Opera classic after Lady General Hua Mu-Lan. Helmed by Chow Sze-loke and written by Chang Cheh, the story revolved around two intellectual siblings, Ching Feng-sheng (Chin Feng) and Ching Feng-hsiao (Ivy Ling Po), who were constantly abused by their stepmother Hsia (Kao Pao-shu). Feng-hsiao was engaged to Li Ru-lung (Chin Han) since birth, but the greedy Hsia forced him to forfeit the marriage. When Ru-lung refused, Hsia framed him for thievery and put him behind bars. To rescue her lover, Feng-hsiao dressed as a young man and went to the capital. She then used Ru-lung's name to enter the national exam and was ranked first place. Impressed by Feng-hsiao, the Emperor decided to let her wed the Princess (Fang Ying). On the wedding night, Feng-hsiao revealed the truth to the Princess.

Title: Mr. Magoo in Sherwood Forest
Synopsis: Join medieval Mr. Magoo, as Friar Tuck, along with Robin Hood and his band of Merry Men on an exciting (mis)adventure in Sherwood Forest! Whether fleeing from the Sherriff of Nottingham or feuding with King John, this band of caring castaways will stop at nothing to bring justice to the poor!—Anonymous

Title: Uma Hora de Amor
Synopsis: António, a factory worker of immense musical talent, is discovered by a business man who launches him as a singer. Nevertheless, this changes the man's life for better and for worst.

Title: Ya Malak
Synopsis: Mahesh is an extremely shy guy and wants his bride to be same as him he goes to meet Sheela a girl chosen for him with his best friend Ramesh.But Sheela is opposite to him so Mahesh takes help of Ramesh to woo her.

Title: Felicia
Synopsis: The wealthy widow of a famed humanitarian blames herself for his accidental death and becomes an alcoholic recluse.

Title: Toto vs. the Black Pirate
Synopsis: José is a Neapolitan petty thief who escapes from the guards and hides himself in a barrel of Jamaican rum on the quay of the port of Naples.

Title: Cover Girls
Synopsis: A French photographer pairs up with a Swedish mannequin he met during a survey of high life in Rome.

Title: Captain Barbell
Synopsis: Marvelous entertainment for the whole family to relish.

Title: Kadin berberi
Synopsis: Lale is the only daughter of a wealthy family and inherits all her parents' money and property. On a boat tour, she meets Erol the hair dresser. In the beginning they feel attracted to each other but all this ends as she belittles him for his job. Erol's customers are all his fans. Lale calls Erol home, introducing her maid Suna as the landlady while she takes the role of a pedicurist. Erol and Lale get together again yet this time her cousin Cemil wants to marry her to share her wealth. Cemil tells Erol about it so, he leaves Lale. Cemil and his mother make a plot to kill Lale. Luckily Suna has been eavesdropping and informs Erol right away. Erol reaches home just before Cemil poisons Lale and saves her. The police arrest Cemil. Cemil's mother drinks the poisoned milk, which she has prepared for Lale. In the end Lale and Erol, Suna and Erol's friend Tayfur marry.—omayra73@yahoo.com

Title: The Block
Synopsis: A twisted tale of prostitution, blackmail, and murder involving strippers at a sleazy "gentlemen's club".

Title: Genesis
Synopsis: An allegory of Adam and Eve...without Eve. An innocent old man departs his forest sanctuary and discovers sin in the big city.
